problem.markdown: 3.The set up time of a register is ( ) the time after the rising edge of the clock that the input data must be valid (x) the time before the rising edge of the clock that the input data must be valid ( ) the time after the rising edge of the clock that the output data must be valid ( ) the time before the rising edge of the clock that the output data must be valid
problem.p: 3.The set up time of a register is

choicegroup.choice: the time after the rising edge of the clock that the input data must be valid
the time before the rising edge of the clock that the input data must be valid
the time after the rising edge of the clock that the output data must be valid
the time before the rising edge of the clock that the output data must be valid
